thread.title: Arsenal star Mesut Ozil ‘engaged to stunning Miss Turkey Amine Gulse and spending £5m on Istanbul mansion’
thread.title_full: Arsenal star Mesut Ozil ‘engaged to stunning Miss Turkey Amine Gulse and spending £5m on Istanbul mansion’

author: gsweet
title: Arsenal star Mesut Ozil ‘engaged to stunning Miss Turkey Amine Gulse and spending £5m on Istanbul mansion’
text:
Comments 
MESUT OZILl has netted a beauty…by getting engaged to a stunning ex-Miss World contestant. 
The Arsenal midfielder has been dating Amine Gulse, the 2014 Miss Turkey winner , in the past year. Instagram @gulseamine Amine Gulse has a ring on her engagement finger, prompting suggestions that she and Mesut Ozil are to be married 
And Turkish media report that German international Ozil, 28, will now wed the 23-year-old this summer. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Arsenal news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Alongside her modelling work, Amine has starred on Turkish television series Asla Vazgecmem. The couple have recently been spotted on nights out together in both London and Istanbul. The pair were seen leaving Novikov, which is a fancy restaurant in central London, with team-mates and friends. Instagram @m10_official Ozil, too, has a ring on his fourth finger Instagram @gulseamine Amine was crowned Miss Turkey in 2014 and is a former Miss World contestant 
They were most recently at the Huqqa restaurant and shisha cafe in Instanbul’s upmarket Kurucesme district. 
Amine has previously denied there is any relationship between the two of them and that they are just friends. 
But both she and Ozil and have been spotted wearing engagement rings. They also reportedly visited two leading hotels in Istanbul to consider them as possible wedding party locations. 
Ozil is believed to be ready to spend £5million on a mansion in the city. Most read in football Manchester United vs Bournemouth team news: Henrikh Mkhitaryan not likely to start despite return Snod in the dock Robert Snodgrass issued arrest warrant for failing to turn up to court over baby in car charges KARREN BRADY It's looking bad for our neighbours Leyton Orient MISS ME? Tony Pulis has last laugh at ex-club Crystal Palace by claiming Eagles have been big-money flops since he quit To be or not to be? What to expect if Craig Shakespeare is chosen to replace Claudio Ranieri as Leicester boss COR! STRIKER LIGHT Aitor Karanka ready to axe Boro's top scorer and turn to the striker with the worst winning record in Prem 
Both the Gunners’ £42million buy from Real Madrid and his raven-haired fiancee have Turkish origins, although neither were born in the country. 
Amine hails from the Swedish city Gothenburg, while Ozil was born in Gelsenkirchen in Germany. He previously dated singer Mandy Capristo. Instagram @gulseamine Amine has appeared on the Turkish television series Asla Vazgecmem Fame Flynet Ozil was caught on camera dining out with Amine Arsenal star Mesut Ozil in training at the gym ahead of their next game 
The midfielder, who has scored nine goals in 29 games for Arsene Wenger's side this season, was previously linked with German pop star Mandy Capristo. 
Ozil's future at The Emirates is unclear given his alleged wage demands. He confirmed this week that Manchester United were after him before he joined Real Madrid in 2010 and that while he wantedto join Barcelona, then manager Pep Guardiola wasn't interested. AP:Associated Press Ozil has scored nine times for Arsenal this season Saturday Premier League match preview featuring Liverpool v Arsenal The superstar has a new book coming out in Germany this month titled The Magic of Football in which he details a number of brilliant encounters and thrilling incidents, including a FURIOUS bust-up with former Real manager Jose Mourinho .
